backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregates feature definitions, referenced files, components, tests, and confidence metadata for project features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and dark‑theme OKLCH color tokens for the UI, applying base background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout with dark hacker theme, header, tabbed lookup interface, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/lookup/NumberInf: Phone‑number lookup UI with input handling, query execution via React Query, and result display.
frontend/src/components/lookup/ResultVie: Displays loading, error, empty, or formatted JSON result states inside a scrollable area.
frontend/src/components/lookup/VehicleIn: Vehicle‑registration lookup UI using input, search action, React Query fetch, and result rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication with AuthClient, including login state and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useNumberInfoQuery.ts: Defines a React Query hook that fetches number information from a remote API using the provided number parameter.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating queries are defined in feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleInfoQuery.t: Defines a React Query hook that retrieves vehicle registration info from an external API based on a registration value.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom dark theme variables, base styles, and terminal-inspired utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, containers, animations, and linking required plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, requirements, and design notes for a dark-themed lookup website using two external APIs.
